players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. They killed Diana."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob, why investigate me? Maybe you are the mafia."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Bob, you lied. Charlie is not mafia. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: remained silent.
You: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. They killed Diana."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Diana. Bob, why investigate me? Maybe you are the mafia."
You: "I investigated Charlie and found him mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
Charlie: remained silent.
Alice: "Bob, you lied. Charlie is not mafia. Vote Bob."
